tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE imaging_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    image_filename TEXT,
    image_type TEXT,
    date_taken DATE,
    physician_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ImagingData (
  patient_id INT,
  image_id INT,
  imaging_type VARCHAR(50),
  imaging_date DATE,
  result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PatientInfo (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  admission_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE diagnostic_imaging_data (
   patient_id INT,
   image_id INT,
   image_type VARCHAR(50),
   diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
   date_taken DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_data (
   research_id INT,
   image_id INT,
   research_type VARCHAR(50),
   research_description TEXT,
   researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
   date_conducted DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clinical_decisions (
   decision_id INT,
   patient_id INT,
   decision_type VARCHAR(50),
   doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
   decision_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ImagingData (
    PatientID INT,
    ImageID INT,
    ImageData BYTEA,
    Diagnosis TEXT,
    DateTaken DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PatientInfo (
    PatientID INT,
    PatientName TEXT,
    DOB DATE,
    Gender CHAR,
    Address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
    StudyID INT,
    ResearcherID INT,
    ImageID INT,
    Findings TEXT,
    AnalysisResult TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ImagingStudy (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    study_date DATE,
    modality VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ImagingResult (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    result_text TEXT,
    result_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES ImagingStudy(study_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RadiologyReport (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_id INT,
    radiologist_id INT,
    report_text TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES ImagingStudy(study_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (radiologist_id) REFERENCES Radiologist(radiologist_id)
);
